headline: S&P 500 Futures Rise as Rate Cut Bets Grow
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Thursday, Oct, 23 2025 US stock futures started mixed this morning, with investors watching rate-sensitive stocks closely as the market digests falling Treasury yields and mounting confidence in a Federal Reserve rate cut next week. As monetary policy expectations shift and a surprise drawdown in crude oil inventories raises questions around supply, sentiment remains cautious. Investors are weighing the risk of economic slowdown against the chance...

headline: How Recent Developments Are Reshaping the SLB Investment Story
summary: SLB's consensus analyst price target has shifted lower in recent weeks, decreasing from $46.02 to $45.16 per share. This adjustment comes as market commentators weigh both external sector headwinds and the company's evolving role in digital transformation. Read on to discover how investors can remain informed about SLB's developing narrative in this rapidly changing landscape. What Wall Street Has Been Saying ? Bullish Takeaways Barclays raised its price target for SLB to $48 from $46 and...
